dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hmm... so that's how it works. I think I get it.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Didn't think this is how I'd get to learn more about the old H Corp.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I don't think I can do much against the reconstruction days right now, but...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... this knowledge will certainly come in handy when the day comes for me to gradually dismantle that iniquitous thing.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: The day when Hongyuan can be a place where people can live without fear.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Without the fear of the encroaching reconstruction days... without obsessively counting their rooms to see if they'll fall or not... Until Hongyuan can be a place where you can sleep with the promise of safe tomorrows.
... I'm sure you'll pull it off.
Oh, and I learned a lot during this lesson too, Miss Faust. I—
Hm. The voltage must have been set too high. Repeating experiment with a different combination of fuses and wires.
... There was supposed to be a lesson somewhere in there, right?
